mapper.insert: INSERT INTO home(home_name, home_tel, home_location) VALUES(#{userName}, #{homeTel}, #{homeLocation});
mapper.select: SELECT h.*, s.sub_id sub_id, if(s.sub_id IS NULL, 0, 1) issubed FROM home h LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM sub WHERE user_id = #{principalId}) s ON h.home_id = s.home_id WHERE h.home_id = #{homeId};
